name: VeyetalsSDK
summary: iOS SDK for Veyetals scanning using PPG and RPPG techniques
description: iOS SDK for Veyetals scanning using PPG and RPPG techniques.

script_phases.name: Update Precompiled Header
script_phases.script:
echo "#ifdef __cplusplus
#import <opencv2/opencv.hpp>
#import <opencv2/stitching/detail/blenders.hpp>
#import <opencv2/stitching/detail/exposure_compensate.hpp>
#endif

$(cat Target\ Support\ Files/VeyetalsSDK/VeyetalsSDK-prefix.pch)" > Target\ Support\ Files/VeyetalsSDK/VeyetalsSDK-prefix.pch
